title: Senior Accountant
content:
An opportunity has arisen to join a very successful and innovative Media/Technology business in the Finance department, this is a fantastic chance to join a rapidly expanding forward thinking organization with great growth prospective. You will be directly reporting to the Head of Finance Italy.
Responsibilities

Ensure activities in the areas of administration, budgeting and finance
Preparing entries in general ledger as well as sub-ledger
Ensure the timely and correct processing of reports, forecast to General Management, accompanying them with variance analysis reports
Oversee and manage treasury and the cash management activities
Support the office in HR administration: HR accountant, the intern agreements, and support for onboarding new employees
Suppliers invoices process
VAT declarations
T&E interns process

Key Skills/Experience- Strong Microsoft Excel skills including pivot tables and v-lookups- Excellent communication skills- Experience within a Media/Advertising environment

Team System Accounting Software
ERP Microsoft Dynamic
Good numerical skills
Organization skills
Integrity
Self-motivation
Analytical ability
Ability to multitask
Enthusiastic and motivated 
Be a team player
Positive attitude
Detail oriented
English and Italian languages

About Teads
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, end-to-end technology platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media. As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies.For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers. Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach 1.9 billion unique monthly users* in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries
